title: Realistic (The Doer)
description: Practical, loves tools, nature, physical tasks.

title: Investigative (The Thinker)
description: Analytical, research-oriented. Loves data and complex puzzles.

title: Artistic (The Creator)
description: Creative, intuitive. Hates routine and strict rules.

title: Social (The Helper)
description: Communicative. Loves teaching, healing, and helping.

title: Enterprising (The Persuader)
description: Leader. Loves influence, risk, money, and management.

title: Conventional (The Organizer)
description: Systematic. Loves precision, numbers, rules, and documents.
